text: 1995 FIFA U-17 World Championship was held in Ecuador from 3 to 20 August. ==Venues== Quito Cuenca Riobamba Ibarra Estadio Olímpico Atahualpa Estadio Alejandro Serrano Aguilar Estadio Olímpico de Riobamba Estadio Olímpico de Ibarra Capacity: 35,742 Capacity: 16,540 Capacity: 14,400 Capacity: 18,600 ==Qualified Teams== Confederation Qualifying Tournament Qualifier(s) AFC (Asia) 1994 AFC U-17 Championship CAF (Africa) 1995 African U-17 Championship CONCACAF (North, Central America & Caribbean) 1994 CONCACAF U-17 Tournament CONMEBOL (South America) Host nation CONMEBOL (South America) 1995 South American U-17 Championship OFC (Oceania) 1995 OFC U-17 Qualifying Tournament UEFA (Europe) 1995 UEFA U-16 Championship ==Results== RSSSF ===Group stage=== ====Group A==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 3 0 0 5 1 +4 9 align=left 3 1 1 1 3 2 +1 4 align=left 3 1 1 1 2 2 0 4 align=left 3 0 0 3 1 6 -5 0 ====Group B==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 3 0 0 7 0 +7 9 align=left 3 1 0 2 5 6 -1 3 align=left 3 1 0 2 3 6 -3 3 align=left 3 1 0 2 2 5 -3 3 ====Group C==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 2 1 0 5 2 +3 7 align=left 3 1 1 1 5 4 +1 4 align=left 3 1 1 1 4 4 0 4 align=left 3 0 1 2 1 5 -4 1 ====Group D==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts align=left 3 2 1 0 5 0 +5 7 align=left 3 2 1 0 5 1 +4 7 align=left 3 1 0 2 3 6 -3 3 align=left 3 0 0 3 1 7 -6 0 ===Knockout stage=== {{Round8-with third |12 August - Quito||2||0 |13 August - Portoviejo||2||1 |12 August - Guayaquil||3||1 |13 August - Portoviejo||3||1 |17 August - Portoviejo||3||1 |17 August - Guayaquil||3||0 |20 August - Guayaquil||3||2 |20 August - Guayaquil||2||0 }} ==References== Category:FIFA U-17 World Cup Category:1995 in association football Category:1990s in South America Category:Football in Ecuador Category:History of Ecuador
